message.name: ERR_FV_INVITATION_ACCEPTANCE_STATUS_MANDATORY
message.locale: Meeting Invitation Acceptance Status must be selected.

message.name: ERR_FV_RELATED_ID_MANDATORY
message.locale: A user, case participant, or external user must be selected.

message.name: ERR_DUPLICATE_ATTENDEE
message.locale: Error, an attendee record already exists for this user, case participant or external user.

message.name: ERR_READING_ATTENDEE_CASE_PARTICIPANT_ROLE
message.locale: Error reading case participant role type for attendee %1s.

message.name: ERR_READING_ATTENDEE_USER_ROLE
message.locale: Error reading case user role for attendee %1s.
